Author: djctavia
Content:
Ah, first you need to know max cap of stamina is "100", you find it in constants.c; you could trick class PlayerStats with: 
```
"RegisterStat(EPlayerStats.STAMINA, new PlayerStat<float>(0, STAMINA_MAX, 100, "Stamina", EPSstatsFlags.EMPTY) );"
```
that the default called method in "Init" of class PlayerStats. btw. I think you only need "SyncStamina", cause that sync server and client, maybe I'm wrong, but you can keep trying

Author: djctavia
Content:
Another way, could be to reuse:
```m_StaminaHandler = new StaminaHandler(this);```
Only cause that will create a new "clean" Stamina handler, and that should trick it, by setting everything by default, but that need to be call every X time
